scripts.build: esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outdir=dist --format=esm --jsx=automatic --minify --external:react --external:react-dom/* --external:lucide-react --external:recharts --external:firebase/* && cp index.html metadata.json dist/ && node -e "const f='dist/index.html'; const h=require('fs').readFileSync(f,'utf8'); require('fs').writeFileSync(f, h.replace('index.tsx','index.js'))"
